  • Constructor Details

    • SendEmailController

      public SendEmailController()

    • SendEmailController

      public SendEmailController(String messageToSend, String matter, String email_sender, String email_sender_pass, String host_email, String port_email, String[] email_desti) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, javax.mail.MessagingException
      Constructor to send an email with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      messageToSend - The content of the email message.
      matter - The subject of the email.
      email_sender - The sender's email address.
      email_sender_pass - The password for the sender's email account.
      host_email - The SMTP host for sending the email.
      port_email - The port number for the email server.
      email_desti - An array containing the recipient's email address/es.
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - If an unsupported encoding is encountered.
      javax.mail.MessagingException - If an error occurs during the messaging process.
